subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Thirty seconds after the Rangers’ Dan Boyle tied the score on a penalty shot, Sedin deflected the puck past Henrik Lundqvist for his 13th goal of the season.
snippet: Thirty seconds after the Rangers’ Dan Boyle tied the score on a penalty shot, Sedin deflected the puck past Henrik Lundqvist for his 13th goal of the season.
